scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=contracts && npm install --workspace=ai-engine
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run compile --workspace=contracts
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=contracts
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules contracts/node_modules ai-engine/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:contracts
